# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="155bd-102">Comment rechercher des options dans les paramètres Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="155bd-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="155bd-103">En haut de la page, sélectionnez l’icône d’engrenage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="155bd-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="155bd-104">pour ouvrir les paramètres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="155bd-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="155bd-105">En bas du volet Paramètres, sélectionnez [**Afficher tous les paramètres Outlook**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="155bd-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="155bd-106">Cette option affiche vos paramètres généraux, de messagerie, de calendrier et (le cas échéant) Premium.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="155bd-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
